tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Type one diabetes is such a disorder where parents will be so depressed and confused.  After meeting Dr. Tejaswi Seshadri we could lead a normal life. Never seen a such a doctor.  She wil clarify all our doubts, Such a humble.
 My kid  Rohan Aditya is so blessed!

She is a great pediatric doctor, she made all the difference in my child's treatment journey. Her commitment for providing care and guidance have been a source of comfort for both me and my daughter during a challenging time. I am very thankful to Dr. Tejaswini. My daughter was pre-diabetic which she brought to normal reading.

Dr. Tejasvi Sheshadri is an exceptionally experienced Pediatric Endocrinologist who demonstrates a profound understanding of the root causes of children's health issues. Her approach to treatment involves thorough monitoring of patients, instilling confidence in the possibility of a cure.

My daughter was diagnosed with sub clinical hypothyroidism. I delivered her at Sparsh ypr branch. Since my baby birth Dr Tejasvi has been very cooperative and has guided us about her medication administration and feeding pattern. She is very patient in answering my infinite questions. Every visit will be end to end checkup for baby . I'm happy that I have met her and she has given me more strength and moral support always.

Doctor Tejasvi  is very helpful in treating our son. She clearly explained the issue and  explained it in a very general terms for us to understand and opt for the treatment. She answered all our questions and we are happy to say we were satisfied with her consultation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Good advice, explanation, treatment, diagnosis, she studies the patient and disease meticulously.
Thanks

review: Dr Tejasvi, is very good with her subject, & explains very well, her way of treating my daughter regarding thyroid issue was very professional. I highly recommend Dr Tejasvi

My Son was contineously gaining weight from the last 2 years(almost just 6 months from Covid start). With the food habbit change that Dr. Tejaswi suggested, son has started loosing weight and now he looks more energetic.

Thank you Dr. Tejaswi.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Tejasvi Sheshadri spent a good time with us explaining the condition & preparing our mind for how the situation can move. This made us prepare ourselves mentally to prepare the child for treatment. So far, the results are positive & we hope the child will be fully cured very soon.
